answers.text:
Here is the RFP we used last time we went out to bid.  We contract 100% of snow removal.

author: Mark Kunkle
text: Ferguson Township, Centre County, PA is considering contracting for winter road maintenance to supplement our current public works department resources. I am looking for sample contracts that other municipalities are using to accomplish the same goal.
title: Winter Road Maintenance Contracts
